attributes.action: Ban the sale of and use of fireworks
attributes.additional_details: Just ban them, what is the point of them, once you've seen one you've seen them all. The funds spent on public displays could be spent better. And individuals should t be able to purchase them for private use full stop.
attributes.background: Fireworks are the most pointless obnoxious think and serve no positive purpose. They cause distress to animals, noise pollution, are dangerous, and incite anti social behaviour.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban fireworks
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700199
